compliant.section: This Privacy Statement explains how your personal information will be collected, processed and used, as well as how such information will be protected by Apacer Technology Inc. and its affiliates.
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data; Lawfulness of processing

compliant.section: Apacer will not process or use your personal information outside the scope of this Statement, unless it is required by law, the competent authority or judicial department.
We will also not sell, exchange or lease out your personal information.
compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to processing of personal data

non_compliant.section: By starting to use Apacer websites or services, or providing your personal information in any way, Apacer will regard it as you understand and agree to this Statement.
non_compliant.amend: Explicit consent should be obtained rather than implied consent through usage.

non_compliant.section: Apacer will not process or use your personal information outside the scope of this Statement, unless it is required by law, the competent authority or judicial department.
non_compliant.amend: Clarify the specific circumstances under which personal data may be processed outside the scope of the Statement.
